item.title: How to Merge PDFs in MacOS
item.description: You can merge PDFs right in the MacOS finder Have all PDFs in a folderMake sure you have all the PDFs you want to merge in the same directory Select the filesYou can select multiple files by CMD + Click Merge files Right Click and hover on Quick Actions Click on Create PDF New merged PDF is now created.
